Initializer# init(_:_:_:_:otherwise:)

iOS 16.0+iPadOS 16.0+Mac CatalystmacOS 13.0+tvOS 16.0+visionOSwatchOS 9.0+

```
init<Value, Parameter>(
    _ keyPath: KeyPath<Intent, Parameter>,
    _ comparisonOperator: ComparableComparisonOperator,
    _ value: Value.ValueType,
    @ParameterSummaryBuilder<Intent> _ when: () -> WhenCondition,
    @ParameterSummaryBuilder<Intent> otherwise: () -> Otherwise
) where Value : ExpressibleByNilLiteral, Value == Parameter.Value, Parameter : AnyIntentValue, Value.ValueType : Comparable
```
